Texts.Eng: Ah, so Adako sent you? It's good to hear from him again, and I'd be glad to help you with this project.

The shield is pretty much done, but I couldn't fix the power supply. I have a friend who might know how to fix it, but he went off to visit some ^orange;alien embassy^reset;. ^green;Find him and bring him the shield^reset;, and he should be able to help you finish the shield.
